original_text: And the border went up by the valley of the son of Hinnom unto the south side of the Jebusite; the same is Jerusalem: and the border went up to the top of the mountain that lieth before the valley of Hinnom westward, which is at the end of the valley of the giants northward:
korean_text: 또 힌놈의 아들의 골짜기로 올라가서 여부스 곧 예루살렘 남쪽 어깨에 이르며 또 힌놈의 골짜기 앞 서쪽에 있는 산 꼭대기로 올라가나니 이곳은 르바임 골짜기 북쪽 끝이며

sentences.original_text: And the border went up by the valley of the son of Hinnom
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 경계는 힌놈의 아들 골짜기를 따라 올라갔고

sentences.original_text: unto the south side of the Jebusite
and the border went up to the top of the mountain
that lieth before the valley of Hinnom westward
sentences.korean_translation: 히놈 골짜기 앞쪽 서쪽에 있는 산이며

sentences.original_text: which is at the end of the valley of giants northward
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 거인들의 골짜기 북쪽 끝에 있다
